Interface Reporter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_MAX_REPORTING_INTERVAL
      By default all the new subscription will reported up to one per minute
      static int DEFAULT_MIN_REPORTING_INTERVAL
      By default all the new subscription will announce only when the value of the attribute change

    • Method Detail

      • addReportListener

        boolean addReportListener(ReportListener listener,
                        boolean subscribe)
        Adds report listener and optionally adds ZigBee subscription.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener
        subscribe - ZigBee level subscription should be added
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful.

      • removeReportListener

        boolean removeReportListener(ReportListener listener,
                           boolean unsubscribe)
        Removes report listener and optionally removes ZigBee subscription.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener
        unsubscribe - whether ZigBee level subscription should be removed
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful.
